# epireports

The goal of epireports is provide report templates for common epidemiological surveys and outbreak reports. The package further contains helper function that standardize certain analyses.

The package is work in progress to test the idea of report templates within a central package. Anything can change or break at any time.

## Installation

You can install the released version of epireports from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("epireports")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("R4EPI/epireports")
```
